Cheetor was looking decidedly excited as talk was centered arou=
nd
infiltrating the Predacon base, his optics blazed slightly as he
nodded.=
 His smile dimmed a bit though when the talk turned to
technological infilt=
ration methods as his brow furrowed.

Lord Elder on the other hand just nod=
ded as the others talked. It
looked as if he were about to say something wh=
en his attention
suddenly distracted by a chirp on the communications board=
, he walked
over to it and began to type in a series of commands and listen=
 to
something.

Cheetor looked at Elder for a moment as he worked and then =
back at
Tuscon and Rat Trap, crossing his arms over his chest. "Don't you h=
ave
to have some sort of physical link to thier system?" Cheetor said,
alth=
ough it is obvious that his knowledge of electronics and hacking
was somewh=
at limited. "Maybe we still need to infiltrate."
